name: Boreas Charger
oracle_text:
Flying
When Boreas Charger leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent who controls more lands than you. Search your library for a number of Plains cards equal to the difference, reveal those cards, put one of them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Bloodtracker
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}, Pay 2 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodtracker.
When Bloodtracker leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: "Flee all you like. The further you run the more firmly I feel your heartbeat."

name: Bloodsworn Steward
oracle_text:
Flying
Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have haste.
flavor_text: "My liege will lead and I will follow—to the battlefield, to the grave, and beyond."

name: Butcher of Malakir
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

name: Breath of the Sleepless
oracle_text:
You may cast Spirit spells as though they had flash.
Whenever you cast a creature spell during an opponent's turn, tap up to one target creature.

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.

name: Charcoal Diamond
oracle_text:
Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
flavor_text: The essence of night to harden the soul.

name: Champion of Dusk
oracle_text: When Champion of Dusk enters the battlefield, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Vampires you control.
flavor_text: "Drench these golden streets in the blood of our enemies."

name: Bygone Bishop
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 3 or less, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

name: Crossway Troublemakers
oracle_text:
Attacking Vampires you control have deathtouch and lifelink.
Whenever a Vampire you control dies, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Lady Anje said no violence at the wedding. She never said anything about the journey there!"

name: Crimson Honor Guard
oracle_text:
Trample
At the beginning of each player's end step, Crimson Honor Guard deals 4 damage to that player unless they control a commander.
flavor_text: The finest soldiers aren't worth a whit without a set of hands to lead them and a set of eyes to guide them.

name: Cordial Vampire
oracle_text: Whenever Cordial Vampire or another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.
flavor_text: "Please, come in! Hors d'oeuvres are on the table."

name: Commander's Sphere
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.
flavor_text: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

name: Crush Contraband
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Exile target artifact.
• Exile target enchantment.
flavor_text: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

name: Crossway Troublemakers
oracle_text:
Attacking Vampires you control have deathtouch and lifelink.
Whenever a Vampire you control dies, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.

name: Damnable Pact
oracle_text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.
flavor_text:
"Silumgar's mind is a dark labyrinth, full of grim secrets and subtle traps."
—Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

name: Custodi Squire
oracle_text:
Flying
Will of the council — When Custodi Squire enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for an artifact, creature, or enchantment card in your graveyard. Return each card with the most votes or tied for most votes to your hand.

name: Custodi Soulbinders
oracle_text:
Custodi Soulbinders enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield.
{2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Custodi Soulbinders: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Disorder in the Court
oracle_text: Exile X target creatures, then investigate X times. Return the exiled cards to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control at the beginning of the next end step. (To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

name: Darksteel Mutation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is an Insect artifact creature with base power and toughness 0/1 and has indestructible, and it loses all other abilities, card types, and creature types.
flavor_text: Infinitely powerless.

name: Dark Impostor
oracle_text:
{4}{B}{B}: Exile target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on Dark Impostor.
Dark Impostor has all activated abilities of all creature cards exiled with it.
flavor_text: "Ah, this is a nice life. I can see why you were so desperate to keep it."

name: Distant Melody
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
flavor_text: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts—on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

name: Disorder in the Court
oracle_text: Exile X target creatures, then investigate X times. Return the exiled cards to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control at the beginning of the next end step. (To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

name: Donal, Herald of Wings
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a nonlegendary creature spell with flying, you may copy it, except the copy is a 1/1 Spirit in addition to its other types. Do this only once each turn. (The copy becomes a token.)
flavor_text: He sees a flicker of Avacyn's grace in every wingbeat.

name: Donal, Herald of Wings
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a nonlegendary creature spell with flying, you may copy it, except the copy is a 1/1 Spirit in addition to its other types. Do this only once each turn. (The copy becomes a token.)

name: Drogskol Captain
oracle_text:
Flying
Other Spirit creatures you control get +1/+1 and have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: Dead or alive, true leaders can inspire an entire army.

name: Dovin, Grand Arbiter
oracle_text:
+1: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a loyalty counter on Dovin, Grand Arbiter.
−1: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. You gain 1 life.
−7: Look at the top ten cards of your library. Put three of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Drogskol Reinforcements
oracle_text:
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
Other Spirits you control have melee.
Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to Spirits you control.

name: Ethereal Investigator
oracle_text:
Flying
When Ethereal Investigator enters the battlefield, investigate X times, where X is the number of opponents you have. (To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with "2, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Ethereal Investigator
oracle_text:
Flying
When Ethereal Investigator enters the battlefield, investigate X times, where X is the number of opponents you have. (To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with "2, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Drogskol Reinforcements
oracle_text:
Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
Other Spirits you control have melee.
Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to Spirits you control.

name: Fell the Mighty
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.
flavor_text:
"They had it coming."
—Squire Imalia, savior of Thiswick

name: Feed the Swarm
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.
flavor_text:
"On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."
—Skyclave inscription

name: Falkenrath Noble
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."

name: Falkenrath Gorger
oracle_text: Each Vampire creature card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Exotic Orchard
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
flavor_text:
"It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."
—Pulan, Bant orchardist

name: Foreboding Ruins
oracle_text:
As Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

name: Flood of Tears
oracle_text: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands. If you return four or more nontoken permanents you control this way, you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"I have wept such a torrent as to scour the land clean."
—Mu Yanling

name: Fire Diamond
oracle_text:
Fire Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
flavor_text: The essence of flame to stoke the spirit.

name: Field of Souls
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Glass-Cast Heart
oracle_text:
Whenever one or more Vampires you control attack, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
{B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 white and black Vampire creature token with lifelink.
{B}{B, {T}, Sacrifice Glass-Cast Heart and thirteen Blood tokens: Each opponent loses 13 life and you gain 13 life.

name: Ghostly Prison
oracle_text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
flavor_text: Though the spirits' bodies were ethereal, Agnur soon learned that their blades were quite solid—and razor-sharp.

name: Ghostly Pilferer
oracle_text:
Whenever Ghostly Pilferer becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever an opponent casts a spell from anywhere other than their hand, draw a card.
Discard a card: Ghostly Pilferer can't be blocked this turn.

name: Geist of Saint Traft
oracle_text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Whenever Geist of Saint Traft attacks, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

name: Haunted Library
oracle_text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: The library of Moormanor had been open to all before the Travails, and it continues to attract curious visitors.

oracle_text:
Flying
When Hanged Executioner enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
{3}{W}, Exile Hanged Executioner: Exile target creature.

oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Hallowed Spiritkeeper dies, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

{B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 white and black Vampire creature token with lifelink.

name: Haunted Library
oracle_text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

name: Haunting Imitation
oracle_text: Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each creature card revealed this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. If no creature cards were revealed this way, return Haunting Imitation to its owner's hand.
